duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement a service assurance framework for the lab environment and analyze quality issues to determine corrective actions.
Maintain a lab and test environment portal showing overall performance, utilization, availability, and schedule.
Contribute to process improvement reviews using Key Performance Indicator (KPI) metrics and eliminate errors to increase lab uptime.
Enforce and improve the Change Management Policy, Procedure, and Process.
Run periodic software audits to ensure software revisions are up to date and in line with ISV recommendations.
Provide Change Management Training as needed to improve process adherence and overall lab quality.
Create reports, KPIs, and suggest enhancements for the lab Intake Process and Change Management Process.
Work with technical writers to document lab processes and maintain updated technical specifications of lab and external systems managed by the lab team.
Analyze test requirements and assign work to lab team, as well as work with the ServiceNow team to build intake templates, reports, and dashboards.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree or the equivalent work experience and/or military experience, Master's preferred
